name: Get Out Of My Way! (Terrarian)
description: A fairly simple dodging game where the player dodges a few different kinds of obstacles.  There are 4 levels that are considerably short and only take a minute or to too complete. But sense that is so short I added an INFINTE MODE where the player dodges one kind of of obstacle and collects coins. You will try to beat your own personal high score and you will have fun.
